response.summary:
As a dedicated Team Lead of software development teams at Rosen, I have spent the past 3 years leading and managing high-performing teams across various settings. My expertise lies in overseeing multiple teams simultaneously, ranging in size from 5 to 10 individuals, and encompassing distributed, hybrid, and on-site setups. 

With a strong focus on achieving organizational goals, I thrive in dynamic environments that require seamless coordination and collaboration. I have cultivated exceptional communication skills through continuous engagement with both internal and external stakeholders from diverse regions around the globe.

Credentials:

I am proud to hold certifications as a Project Management Professional (PMP) and a Scrum Master, which have enhanced my ability to drive successful project outcomes. These qualifications have equipped me with the knowledge and strategies necessary to lead teams effectively and deliver results in a fast-paced and ever-changing business landscape.

Passion and Approach:

My passion lies in fostering a culture of continuous improvement and team empowerment. By leveraging my expertise in agile methodologies and team dynamics, I strive to create an environment that encourages innovation, creativity, and excellence. I firmly believe in the power of collaboration, and I actively promote open communication and knowledge sharing among team members.

Aspirations:

Looking ahead, I am committed to further honing my leadership skills and staying at the forefront of industry trends. I aspire to take on greater responsibilities and contribute to organizational growth, whether by expanding my knowledge in emerging technologies, driving process improvements, or mentoring aspiring professionals in their career journeys.

Let's Connect:

I welcome connections with like-minded professionals, thought leaders, and individuals passionate about driving impactful change. Feel free to reach out to me via email at holmansan@hotmail.com or connect with me on LinkedIn.
response.skills: Project Management, Scrum, Cloud Development, Agile Project Management, Leadership, Team Leadership, Proactividad, Orientación a objetivos, Trabajo en equipo, Trabajo bajo presión, Estrategias competitivas, Administración de proyectos, Capacidad de análisis y síntesis, Desarrollo de software, Diseño de tecnología, Flexibilidad y adaptabilidad, Liderazgo de equipos, Manejo de recursos materiales, Planeación estratégica, Planeación y organización del trabajo

profile_positions.description: Automatización de pruebas de humo (smoke test), pruebas de regresión, pruebas exploratorias (monkey testing y rippers) para aplicaciones web y desktop, con herramientas open source y licenciadas como Selenium, Appium, Protractor, TestComplete, TestLeft y con algunos frameworks de pruebas como Jasmine y Cucumber. Experiencia en control de versionamiento e integración continua (nightly build) con GIT, y Azure Devops (TFS). Orientacion al logro y al cliente en Ingles.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero de pruebas de automatización

profile_positions.description: Desarrollo de software que permita optimización y automatización de procesos, pruebas y reportes gerenciales (Selenium, Automation Anywhere, Java, C#, Visual Basic, Power BI, VBA). Desarrollo y administración de aplicaciones web con Mantiz 4.0, HTML, .NET, XML y Javascript. Administración de bases de datos, procedimientos almacenados, integración de aplicaciones con SQL Server 2012 R2, PL/SQL Developer y Oracle Developer de todos los servicios del Banco, en los entornos de Desarrollo, Pruebas y Producción. Análisis BIG DATA y Minería de Datos con Power BI. Administración de servicios web en .NET, IIS, SOAP UI y despliegue de motores en Java. Administración y soporte de Macros del banco (Nomina, Financiera, Creditos, Operativas) a nivel nacional. Uso de herramientas compartidas como Sharepoint y Jira. Experiencia con metodología Scrum.
profile_positions.title: Analista de desarrollo

profile_positions.description: Desarrollo de software que permita optimización y automatización de procesos, pruebas y reportes gerenciales (Visual Basic, ORACLE SQL y PL-SQL). Planeación y ejecución del cronograma mensual de inventarios (aprox. 200 millones de registros). Administrar bases de datos de todos los proyectos y procesos de la compañía. Análisis BIG DATA y Minería de Datos con ORACLE SQL y TIBCO SPOTFIRE. Contacto directo con la operación y clientes para atender contingencias a niv el nacional. Asistir a reuniones y atender auditorias con clientes internos y externos (distintos sectores como Bancos, Universidades y empresas del sector público). Buenas practicas con herramientas como SKP, Documenta, Oracle, Tibco – Spotfire, Visual Basic Y Office.
profile_positions.title: Analista de soporte de operaciones

education.degree_name: Especialización en Gerencia de Proyectos en Inteligencia de Negocios

company.name: ROSEN
company.description:
The ROSEN Group is a globally leading provider of cutting-edge solutions in all areas of the integrity process chain. The business is privately owned and employs a team of almost 4,000 workers, operating in more than 120 countries.

“Empowered by technology” is the promise that ROSEN systematically delivers on by enhancing the operations of our customers and making them safe, cost-effective and more efficient. ROSEN offers the know-how and technology to ensure that customers comply with legal standards and safeguard people and environment, while gaining maximum profit from assets as diverse as pipelines, tanks, vessels, wind turbines, trains, and telecommunication towers.

ROSEN’s products and services:
• Inspection of critical industrial assets to ensure reliable operations of the highest standards and effectiveness
• Customized engineering consultancy providing efficient asset integrity management
• Production and supply of customized novel systems and products
• Market-driven, topical state-of-the-art research and development providing “added value” products and services
